title.native: フルーツバスケット 1st Season

description:
Tohru Honda thought her life was headed for misfortune when a family tragedy left her living in a tent. When her small home is discovered by the mysterious Soma clan, she suddenly finds herself living with Yuki, Kyo, and Shigure Soma. But she quickly learns their family has a bizarre secret of their own: when hugged by the opposite sex, they turn into the animals of the Zodiac!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #フルーツバスケット #フルバ #fruba #furuba
synonyms: เสน่ห์สาวข้าวปั้น

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Fairy Tale
tags.description: This work tells a fairy tale, centers around fairy tales, or is based on a classic fairy tale.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Rehabilitation
tags.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Homeless
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is homeless.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Denpa
tags.description: Works that feature themes of social dissociation, delusions, and other issues like suicide, bullying, self-isolation, paranoia, and technological necessity in daily lives. Classic iconography: telephone poles, rooftops, and trains.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Gangs
tags.description: Centers around gang organizations.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/n_takaya77)

Natsuki Takaya is a Japanese manga artist best known for creating the series Fruits Basket.

Takaya was born and raised in Tokyo, where she made her debut as a manga artist in 1992. Takaya is left handed and had wanted to be a manga artist since first grade, when her sister started drawing.

__Awards:__
* 2001: Kodansha Manga Award, Shojo : _Fruits Basket_

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/inokoriinosan) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岸本卓)

Originally an employee at [Studio Ghibli](https://anilist.co/studio/21/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/caitlinsvoice) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/caitlinsvoice/) | [Myspace](https://myspace.com/caitlintiffany) | [Blog](https://kiristokyoto.livejournal.com/)

An American voice actor, voice director, and script writer for Funimation, New Generation Pictures, and Bang Zoom! Entertainment. She's been working in the anime industry since 2004. She grew up in the San Diego area, California, and has been married to Tony Patterson since 2009. Outside of voice acting, Caitlin has worked as an ESL teacher in Spain.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Beverly_avex) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/beverly_official_/) Filipino pop singer based in Japan under the Avex Trax label. For her solo debut, she sang "Everlasting Sky", the theme song for Kamen Rider Build, Be The One and subsequently released her debut solo album titled 24.

__[Website](https://vickeblanka.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/VickeBlanka)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/vickeblanka)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/vickeblanka/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWDksMO8R0Mew4B89GhO9dA)__ | __[Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0PYPjvZaOa7bsCq26JOX8d)__ | __[Line](https://timeline.line.me/user/_daxTTMx3-KSyhf9YSLtl4q4KzB8TWXlrqLzGV2I)__

__Biography:__
Junya Yamaike, better known by his stage name Vickeblanka, is a versatile guitarist, pianist, vocalist, lyricist and composer under record label avex trax. His songs are best characterized by his individuality, good melodies and his beautiful falsetto voice. 

He started composing music when he was in elementary school, which drove him to pursue music as a career, and as a result he decided to attend university in Tokyo. In 2016, he was finally able to debut. Since his debut, his performances have impressed the audience, making him one of the must-see musicians in the up and coming music scene.

INTERSECTION are a boy band based in Tokyo composed of William, Kazuma, Caelan and Mika.

[Official Website](https://intersection-tokyo.jp/)
[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/intersectiontyo)

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/inokoriinosan) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岸本卓)

Originally an employee at [Studio Ghibli](https://anilist.co/studio/21/).
